Class CsvTableReader

              • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.read.CsvTableReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubTableReader, TableReader

    public class CsvTableReader
extends DelimitedTextTableReader
    The CsvTableReader is a delimited data table reader used with comma-separated value (CSV) files.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CsvTableReader

        public CsvTableReader(java.lang.String filePath,
              java.lang.String tableName,
              boolean multiline)
        Constructor specifying the file and table name for the csv data.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the csv data file.
        tableName - The name to use for the table.
        multiline - Boolean specifying if DelimitedDataReader reader should allow multiline data entries or not.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if fileName was not found.

      • CsvTableReader

        public CsvTableReader(java.lang.String filePath,
              java.lang.String tableName)
        Constructor specifying the file and table name for the csv data. Multiline data entries will not be allowed.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the csv data file.
        tableName - The name to use for the table.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if fileName was not found.

      • CsvTableReader

        public CsvTableReader(java.lang.String filePath,
              boolean multiline)
        Constructor specifying the file the csv data. The file name (excluding directories) will be used as the table name.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the csv data file.
        multiline - Boolean specifying if DelimitedDataReader reader should allow multiline data entries or not.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if filePath was not found.

      • CsvTableReader

        public CsvTableReader(java.lang.String filePath)
        Constructor specifying the file the csv data. The file name (excluding directories) will be used as the table name. Multiline data entries will not be allowed.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the csv data file.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if filePath was not found.
